name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartStudi Sidebar - AI Detector, Paraphraser, and More!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check, Paraphrase, and Create Undetectable AI Content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to use the feature on smartstudi.com in a compact and convenient sidebar. You can:
✅Check content for AI and plagiarism
✅Paraphrase content to beat AI detectors
✅Generate undetectable AI essays
✅Create citations in APA, MLA, Chicago and more
✅Summarize large texts
✅Check grammar

To use you will have to login or sign up for an account on smartstudi.com
